title: Blue Monday (with Tobias Ellwood MP)
itunes:title: Blue Monday (with Tobias Ellwood MP)
description:
Conservative MP and Former Defence Minister Tobias Ellwood tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek why a Brexit deal has become more likely. Bloomberg's Anna Edwards joins from the Conservative Party Conference in Manchester, along side Brexit Editor Edward Evans in London.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
